00026 namespace egui { 
00027 
00028 
00029 namespace handle_events {
00030     struct window_top {
00031         struct ev {
00032             // the events
00033             struct move;
00034             struct size;
00035             struct activate;
00036             struct enable;
00037             struct set_redraw;
00038             struct close;
00039             struct quit;
00040             struct show;
00041             struct set_cursor;
00042             struct help;
00043             struct timer;
00044             struct horiz_scroll;
00045             struct vert_scroll;
00046             struct enter_idle;
00047             struct sizing;
00048             struct moving;
00049 
00050             struct paint;
00051             struct erase_bg;
00052             struct key_press;
00053             struct char_;
00054             struct set_focus;
00055             struct kill_focus;
00056             struct mouse_move;
00057             struct mouse_click;
00058             struct mouse_double_click;
00059             struct menu;
00060 
00061             typedef egui::ev::base notify;
00062         };
00063 
00064         // the handlers
00065         virtual void on_move( ev::move & ) {}
00066         virtual void on_size( ev::size & ) {}
00067         virtual void on_activate( ev::activate & ) {}
00068         virtual void on_enable( ev::enable & ) {}
00069         virtual void on_set_redraw( ev::set_redraw & ) {}
00070         virtual void on_close( ev::close & ) {}
00071         virtual void on_quit( ev::quit & ) {}
00072         virtual void on_show( ev::show & ) {}
00073         virtual void on_set_cursor( ev::set_cursor & ) {}
00074         virtual void on_help( ev::help & ) {}
00075         virtual void on_timer( ev::timer & ) {}
00076         virtual void on_horiz_scroll( ev::horiz_scroll & ) {}
00077         virtual void on_vert_scroll( ev::vert_scroll & ) {}
00078         virtual void on_enter_idle( ev::enter_idle & ) {}
00079         virtual void on_sizing( ev::sizing & ) {}
00080         virtual void on_moving( ev::moving & ) {}
00081 
00082         virtual void on_paint( ev::paint & ) {}
00083         virtual void on_erase_bg( ev::erase_bg & ) {}
00084         virtual void on_key_press( ev::key_press & ) {}
00085         virtual void on_char_( ev::char_ & ) {}
00086         virtual void on_set_focus( ev::set_focus & ) {}
00087         virtual void on_kill_focus( ev::kill_focus & ) {}
00088         virtual void on_mouse_move( ev::mouse_move & ) {}
00089         virtual void on_mouse_click( ev::mouse_click & ) {}
00090         virtual void on_mouse_double_click( ev::mouse_double_click & ) {}
00091         virtual void on_menu_command(ev::menu&) {}
00092         virtual void on_notify(ev::notify&) {}
00093 
00094         struct events_type {
00095             event_handler < ev::move  > on_move;
00096             event_handler < ev::size  > on_size;
00097             event_handler < ev::activate  > on_activate;
00098             event_handler < ev::enable  > on_enable;
00099             event_handler < ev::set_redraw  > on_set_redraw;
00100             event_handler < ev::close  > on_close;
00101             event_handler < ev::quit  > on_quit;
00102             event_handler < ev::show  > on_show;
00103             event_handler < ev::set_cursor  > on_set_cursor;
00104             event_handler < ev::help  > on_help;
00105             event_handler < ev::timer  > on_timer;
00106             event_handler < ev::horiz_scroll  > on_horiz_scroll;
00107             event_handler < ev::vert_scroll  > on_vert_scroll;
00108             event_handler < ev::enter_idle  > on_enter_idle;
00109             event_handler < ev::sizing  > on_sizing;
00110             event_handler < ev::moving  > on_moving;
00111             event_handler < ev::paint  >  on_paint;
00112             event_handler < ev::erase_bg  > on_erase_bg;
00113             event_handler < ev::key_press  > on_key_press;
00114             event_handler < ev::char_  > on_char_;
00115             event_handler < ev::set_focus  > on_set_focus;
00116             event_handler < ev::kill_focus  > on_kill_focus;
00117             event_handler < ev::mouse_move  > on_mouse_move;
00118             event_handler < ev::mouse_click  > on_mouse_click;
00119             event_handler < ev::mouse_double_click  > on_mouse_double_click;
00120             event_handler < ev::menu> on_menu_command;
00121             event_handler < ev::notify> on_notify;
00122         } events;
00123     };
